B&B Room

The Winterborne

A beautiful room with views over the rear garden and countryside. The luxury en-suite bathroom has an Ecosquare Shower Bath with overhead shower, heated towel rail and under-floor heating. Facilities include Satellite TV, DVD, tea and coffee making facilities, bottled water, hair dryer.

Rates for Winterborne

Single Occupancy For 2 People
1 Night £115 £110
2+ Nights £75 £70
